A paginated response wrapper for device collections, containing the list of devices along with pagination metadata and filtered count information.

## Key Components

- **DevicesResponse** - Main response class with Lombok annotations for data binding
- **devices** - List of `DeviceResponse` objects representing individual devices
- **pageInfo** - `PageInfo` object containing pagination details (page size, current page, etc.)
- **filteredCount** - Total number of devices matching applied filters

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a devices response
DevicesResponse response = DevicesResponse.builder()
    .devices(Arrays.asList(
        DeviceResponse.builder()
            .id("device-1")
            .name("Smart Display")
            .build(),
        DeviceResponse.builder()
            .id("device-2")
            .name("Digital Kiosk")
            .build()
    ))
    .pageInfo(PageInfo.builder()
        .page(1)
        .size(10)
        .totalPages(5)
        .build())
    .filteredCount(47)
    .build();

// Accessing response data
List<DeviceResponse> devices = response.getDevices();
int totalFiltered = response.getFilteredCount();
PageInfo pagination = response.getPageInfo();
```

The class uses Swagger annotations for API documentation and follows standard REST pagination patterns for device management endpoints.
